Properties.ProtectedString:
Tool = script.Parent
local stillEquipped = false
function onEquippedLocal(mouse) stillEquipped = true if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end while stillEquipped do print("Setting Mouse to go") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" while Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end print("Setting Mouse to wait") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" while not Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end end end
function onUnequippedLocal() stillEquipped = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)

local Tool = script.Parent local Sword = Tool.Handle
local vCharacter local myTorso local myHumanoid local vPlayer
local humanoids = {}
Tool.Enabled = true
local damage = 17 local bg
local slashAnim local dashTime = 0 local lastKeyDown = 0 local lastAttack = 0
local torsoCFrames = {}
local amAnimating = false
local debris = game:GetService("Debris")
local firePart = Sword:FindFirstChild("FirePart") local storeWeld = Sword:FindFirstChild("FireWeld") while storeWeld == nil or firePart == nil do firePart = Sword:FindFirstChild("FirePart") storeWeld = Sword:FindFirstChild("FireWeld") wait() end
local runService = game:GetService("RunService")
function tagHumanoid(humanoid, player) if humanoid then local creatorTag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creatorTag.Name = "creator" creatorTag.Value = player creatorTag.Parent = humanoid end end
function swordUp() Tool.GripForward = Vector3.new(-1, 0, 0) Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(0, 0, 1) Tool.GripRight = Vector3.new(0, 1, 0) Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(0, 0, 1) end
function swordDown() Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(1, 0, 0) Tool.GripRight = Vector3.new(0, 1, 0) Tool.GripForward = Vector3.new(0, 0, 1) Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(1, 0, 0) end
function slashIt(myHumanoid, myTorso) swordDown() bg = Instance.new("BodyGyro") bg.P = 100000 bg.maxTorque = Vector3.new(bg.P, bg.P, bg.P) bg.Name = "BG"
torsoCFrames[1] = myTorso.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(0, 1*math.pi/3, 0) torsoCFrames[2] = myTorso.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(0, 2*math.pi/3, 0) torsoCFrames[3] = myTorso.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(0, math.pi, 0) torsoCFrames[4] = myTorso.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(0, 4*math.pi/3, 0) torsoCFrames[5] = myTorso.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(0, 5*math.pi/3, 0) torsoCFrames[6] = myTorso.CFrame
bg.Parent = myTorso
for i = 1, 84 do local c = i%6 + 1 if bg then bg.cframe = torsoCFrames[c] end wait(0.025) end
swordUp()
if bg then bg:Remove() end wait(2.0) end
function onKeyDown(key) vCharacter = Tool.Parent myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if myHumanoid == nil then return end if key == "w" then t = runService.Stepped:wait() if (t - lastKeyDown < 0.2) then dashTime = t end lastKeyDown = t end end
function blow(hit) local humanoid if hit and hit.Parent then humanoid = hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid and humanoid ~= myHumanoid and myHumanoid then tagHumanoid(humanoid, vPlayer) humanoid:TakeDamage(damage) if humanoid.Parent:FindFirstChild("SlowScript") == nil then local cloneScript = script.SlowScript:Clone() cloneScript.Parent = humanoid.Parent cloneScript.Disabled = false end end end end
function onActivated() if Tool.Enabled == false then return end
if myHumanoid == nil or myTorso == nil then return end
Tool.Enabled = false
slashAnim = myHumanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.SlashAnim)
local t = runService.Stepped:wait() if t - dashTime < 0.2 then slashIt(myHumanoid, myTorso) wait(0.5) amAnimating = false else if slashAnim then slashAnim:Play() end wait(0.6) amAnimating = false end wait(0.5) Tool.Enabled = true end
function onEquipped(mouse) vCharacter = Tool.Parent myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if mouse then mouse.KeyDown:connect(onKeyDown) end if storeWeld then local reWeld = storeWeld:Clone() reWeld.Parent = Sword end end
function onUnequipped() end
Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated) Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)
Sword.Touched:connect(blow)

local vCharacter = script.Parent local myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") local myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid")
local duration = 5
if myHumanoid and myTorso then myHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 9.0 local fire = Instance.new("Fire") fire.Color = Color3.new(51/255, 51/255, 204/255) fire.SecondaryColor = Color3.new(102/255, 0, 1) fire.Parent = myTorso while duration > 0 do myHumanoid:TakeDamage(5.0) wait(1) duration = duration - wait(1) end myHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 16.0 if fire then fire:Remove() end end
wait(2.0) script:Remove()
